statements: UPDATE weather_alerts SET severity='High' WHERE alert_id=1;
UPDATE weather_alerts SET location='New York' , alert_type='Storm' WHERE alert_id=2;
UPDATE weather_alerts SET severity='High', location='Los Angeles' WHERE alert_id=1;
UPDATE weather_alerts SET alert_type='Tornado', timestamp='2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE alert_id=2;
UPDATE weather_alerts SET alert_message = 'Severe thunderstorm warning' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_notifications SET message = 'New message from admin' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE weather_alerts SET alert_type='Severe Thunderstorm Warning', alert_message='Seek shelter immediately' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE user_notifications SET notification_type='Email', message='New promotion for you!', created_at='2022-06-30 10:00:00' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE WeatherAlerts SET alert_level='High' WHERE alert_id=1;
UPDATE UserLocations SET last_alert_timestamp='2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id=3;
UPDATE WeatherAlerts SET alert_description = 'Severe thunderstorm approaching', alert_level = 'High' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE UserLocations SET last_alert_timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE weather_alerts SET alert_message = 'Heavy rain warning' WHERE alert_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE weather_alerts SET alert_message = 'Heavy rainfall warning' WHERE alert_type = 'Rain'
UPDATE user_notifications SET notification_time = '2022-05-20 09:00:00' FROM user_notifications AS un JOIN users AS u ON un.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe'
UPDATE weather_alerts SET a_location = 'New York' WHERE a_id = 1;
UPDATE alert_subscribers SET s_category_id = 2 WHERE s_id = 3;
UPDATE weather_alerts SET a_description = 'Heavy rain expected in the evening', a_timestamp = '2022-09-15 18:00:00', a_severity = 'High' WHERE a_id = 1;
UPDATE user_notifications SET n_is_read = TRUE, n_timestamp = '2022-09-15 12:00:00' WHERE n_id = 3;
